title: Traditional Galio
body:
Am i the only one who misses old Galio?

new galios kit is alright i guess but, my god, his Dialogue... its so bad its actually distracting o_O  im struggling to get the last Lv7 token for him just so i never have to play him again Lol

Where my Traditional Galio at?

replies.body:
I miss my old Galio so much. They really did him a disservice with this rework.

RIP my Galio <3

Contrary to what any body thinks even Galio mains I loved  old galio and think His E was his best and defining ability. as a melee/ engage enabler As well as enableing retreats for people who needed it (if he positioned right) like how everyone now days has dashes or 600 movement speed but more balanced.

"WHOA! I didn't know I had a tail!"
—The smartest champion in Runeterra

Riot stopped doing Traditional skins a long time ago. But, don't worry, you will get downvoted into oblivion for liking pre-reworked champions instead!

Enjoy :p
